title: Effective Learning and Communication Strategies in E-Learning and Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and instructional experience
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service and in-service teachers to acquire effective teaching methods and communication strategies in blended learning environments. Includes practical training in smartphone-centric, technology-constrained settings

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain communication methods suitable for information delivery and collaborative activities in blended learning.
Learners can design an online information-sharing and feedback system using smartphone-based tools.
Learners can plan activities that promote social relationship building and collaborative learning in face-to-face classes.
Learners can propose assessment strategies for measuring learning outcomes in hybrid learning environments.

resources: Online collaboration tools (KakaoTalk, Google Docs, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
